6.7.1 Framework classes and definition macro

define COM-interface

Definition macro

Library

OLE-Server

Module

OLE-Server

Description

Defines COM interface subclasses. The syntax and semantics of this macro are exactly the same as those for define class, but for implementation reasons it is not presently possible to use define class.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
